attributes.action: keep the driving age limit to 17.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should the majority of teenagers be punished for the minority! Its time the government listened to what teenagers have to say. We are the ones that will suffer because our voices are never heared! please hear us now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
